attributes.action: That the present Primeminister and the previous Primeminister Stand Trial for High Treason
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair and Gordon Brown have handed over the sovereignty of Great Britain to a Foreign Power when they helped make up new constitution for Europe under the name of of the Lisbon Treaty and Have Ratified it against the wishes of the Citizens of the UK.The EU are now able and will make decisions that are against what the People of the UK want.

rejection.details: Legal and judicial authorities would have to decide whether to pursue this case.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
